messages.subject: problem with the Acme files (may be just me)
messages.msgSnippet: I had a problem with opening the Acme files in the files section at yahoogroups, Pam. Maybe it s just me, but in case others have a problem too, I d like to
messages.messageBody:
I had a problem with opening the Acme files in the files section at
yahoogroups, Pam.

Maybe it's just me, but in case others have a problem too, I'd like to put
them on a webpage linked to Carol's plan (and because it would be searchable
through google, too).

I clicked the secondary, and it started to download (rather than opening) and
my computer froze up.

I rebooted, emptied my cache files, dumped the trash, checked that file, and
it had a lot of garbage/command stuff at the end, but seemed possibly
otherwise to be there.

I tried opening the elementary, and it froze too. When I rebooted (and
practiced my calming deep breathing, and checked on Holly, and vacuumed the stairs)
it ended without a bunch of character notes, so I'm not sure if I have it all.

Does it end with the math paragraph? If this is the end, I have it:

Mathematics: ACME students will develop mathematical concepts, operational
skills, and problem solving through participation in daily real-world
activities such as cooking, building, shopping, budgeting, computing, etc. Mathematics
materials will be chosen to support students’ individual learning styles in
order to achieve competency in operational skills and insight into
problem-solving procedures. Our goal is for ACME
stu椀挀猀 愀猀 眀攀氀氀 愀猀 愀渀 愀瀀瀀爀攀挀椀愀琀椀漀渀 昀漀爀 琀栀攀†daily applications of mathematics in their lives.

========

I think it might be multiple fonts that caused the problem for me.

I'll put them here, but they're not there yet as I post this (but will be by
the time some of you read it):

http://sandradodd.com/acme1
http://sandradodd.com/acme2

Thanks!

Sandra
